For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

[header]

Your video has been processed and is ready to be viewed. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the owner of the video when the uploaded video has failed to be processed.
Your video "[object_title]" has failed to process

[header]

We apologize, but there was a problem processing your video. The message was:
"[message]"

Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][message_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the owner of the video when the uploaded video has been approved and is ready for viewing.

[header]

Your video has been approved and is ready to be viewed. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the owner of the video when the uploaded video has been disapproved and is ready for viewing.

Your video has been disapproved and is ready to be viewed. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
